lender.name: Justyna
lender.loan_because: It is so powerful- I loan to entrepreneurs in the developing world that will have an impact on their country's poverty.

lender.name: Nathalie
lender.loan_because: I believe we are all connected, and helping others is like helping ourselves in the end. (That shouldn't sound selfish, it's more about recognizing that we all need help sometimes.)
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to eat healthy foods, and how to make good dietary choices that are sustainable for the whole world.

lender.name: DecalGal
lender.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit as the best way to improve the lives of individuals and their families, contribute to the local economy, and lift entire communities out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I have a small manufacturing company, run primarily from my home. I have manufactured graphics for vehicles since 2001.

lender.name: RMCHS
lender.loan_because: We recognize our good fortunes and want to give to people less fortunate than ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: High School Students

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: this loan process launches cycles of sustainable postive change for those involved.
lender.occupational_info: I teach in a college that values Participatory Action Research as a best practice for sustainable positive change for vulnerable individuals, families and communities. This page is a shining example of this process.

lender.occupational_info: Being cute!

lender.name: Amitav
lender.loan_because: I believe others need help.

lender.name: Katherine

lender.occupational_info: I help facilitate trade in the fixed income markets of Latin America.

lender.name: yasamin

I am looking to bring the great states of Pennsylvania and Georgia together. The Middleswarth Chips is the key. I am try to get a mobile food cart. I would like to sell hot dogs, popcorn,drinks and these tasty chips. I plan to sell at festivals and events The best way to bring people together is with food.

lender.occupational_info: i work with the public, so everyday i see people needing all kinds of help and i take that as a chance to make a difference in that persons life. now that i have taken on a new endeavor with my artist, life has become challenging for me. A MOTHER OF EIGHT!!!

I love reading the stories of entrepreneurs on Kiva and want to encourage them. Never give up and always believe in yourself! Every human being can help change the world.

lender.name: kingsolomonfatal
lender.loan_because: I HAVE WORKED HARD ALL MY LIFE..MADE IT FROM THE STREETS OF CHICAGO AS A FOSTER CHILD..BEEN ON WARNER SANDER TALK SHOW(YOU) ABOUT LIVING ON THE STREETS WHEN I WAS 12YEARS OLD..BUT NOW I'M ALL GROWN UP..I WAS INJURED AT WORK MARCH 10 OF 2008...HAD TO LEAVE JULY 17,2008 WAS NO LONGER ABLE TO PERFORM MY DUTIES..THAT OK BECAUSE I HAVE AN ATTORNEY AND WORKING ON WORKER COMPENSATION..I WILL BE UNDER GOING KNEE REPLACEMENT SURGERY JUST AS SO AS I CAN GET MY BLOOD PRESSURE DOWN WHICH IS TAKING SOME TIME.WORKER COMPENSATION WILL KICK IN WHEN THAT HAPPENS AND PAY ME BACK PAYMENT FROM JULY 17...AND I CAN'T WAIT.MY LAWYER HAS A NICE DAMAGE SETTLEMENT COMING TO ME..BUT MY TROUBLE IS NOW..I HAVE BEEN LIVING OFF MY PERSONAL SAVING SINCE JULY OF 2008 AND ITS GONE..I DID WELL UP TO THIS POINT...BUT TRYING TO FIGHT A CASE WHEN THE INSURANCE OR WORKER COMPENSATION TAKES THEIR SWEET TIME HURT THE VICTIMS..I AM ABOUT TO BE TOSS ON MY BUTT SOON..I NEED FINANCIAL HELP..I CAN'T BE HOMELESS.I HAVE A BEAUTIFUL 4YRS OLD DAUGHTER AND I CAN NOT LOST MY APARTMENT.WE NEED YOUR HELP PLEASE

lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have a chance to follow his or her dreams, whether out of financial need or personal independence.
lender.occupational_info: I have devoted the last 20 years to raising my sons. My oldest son has Asbergers Syndrome, which is a form of Autism, and so he does not learn well in conventional schools, even though he is very intelligent, and he does not function well in general society. At the age of 20, he is more like a boy of 16. It requires a lot of time to work with the schools and other people to educate them on Asberger's Syndrome. He cannot think beyond the next day. He does not have dreams of his future.

lender.name: SCCBank
lender.loan_because: SCCBank has issued a novel currency that is partially backed by environmental and social goods. We are loaning a portion of our currency reserves across the globe, via Kiva.
lender.occupational_info:
SCCBank is a San Francisco-based financial innovation start-up, focusing on complementary currency systems.
Ken Lynch founded SCCBank with other top tier school graduates to develop a pipeline of currency, payment, and banking innovations for a quickly changing financial and political landscape. Start-up values include financial safety, the environment, and community.
The Carbon Coin is our first prototype currency, sold as novel art pieces. We are investigating how to grow this project within the context of the American regulatory framework, and are exploring how future Carbon Coins and other new currency innovations (including new mediums of exchange, store of value methods, etc) should be regulated.

lender.loan_because: I admire people who strive to make a difference to their own lives, through hard work and determination. lender.occupational_info:
I work fulltime, but I also own a few websites that I run as a business in my spare time. These generate a bit of extra income which in turn, means I'm in a fortunate position to be able to help others.
I can't get enough of travelling & exploring, love the escapism that scuba-diving offers, play golf badly and I'm in the process of learning photography
Any menu that has Cheesecake or Flapjacks listed as a desert, in my eyes, is a winner!

lender.name: Dan

lender.occupational_info: Using Lean Construction principles, I work with design and construction teams to help them raise their levels of collaboration, trust and communication so they work together more effectively and efficiently. As a result there is more value to the customer, less waste, and projects cost less and people are happier.

lender.name: Skelton Music
lender.loan_because: 100% of every purchase through Skelton Music is redirected into a Kiva loan to help alleviate poverty. This loan will be put in the hands of an entrepreneur in need. Once the funds have been repaid, they are immediately redistributed to another person. Thank you to everyone that has made a purchase---check out how many people we have helped so far!

lender.name: Ethical Culture Society
lender.loan_because: We want to help others create a better world
lender.occupational_info:
The Ethical Culture Society of Silicon Valley is a vibrant, caring community dedicated to cultivating ethical growth and action in its members and in the larger world.
Ethical Culture is a humanistic religious, philosophical, and educational movement inspired by the ideal that the supreme aim of life is working to create a more humane society. Our focus is on how we live our lives. Our faith is in the capacity and responsibility of human beings to act in their personal relationships and in the larger community to help create a better world.
Members come together to assist each other in developing ethical ideas and ideals; to celebrate life's joys and support each other through life's crises; to work together to improve our world and the world of our children.

This network of affiliates means that whenever you want to buy anything you, simply do it through your own Ei42 shop and you earn yourself a commission and also from your friends. We all help each other. It is as easy as that. It has all the shops like Amazon, Ebay, Asda, Currys, M&S, Next and more for train and plane tickets, clothes etc.
